squidpony.squidgrid.shape

Interface WangTile


  • @Beta
public interface WangTile
    Represents a tile that is edge and corner (which are considered edges centered at the corner) aware for matching with other tiles.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WangEdge getEdge(Direction dir)
      Returns the patter of the edge at the given direction.
